Interface ClientStateVisitor

All Known Subinterfaces:
ClientView
All Known Implementing Classes:
ClientStateOverlayFormatter, GUIView, TUIView
public interface ClientStateVisitor
Visitor interface that allows any implementer to distinguish between the various subclasses of ClientState.
